mapper.select: select t.id, t.video_id as videoId, t.tag from Tags t where t.id=#{id}

select count(id) from Tags t where 1=1
and t.video_id=#{videoId}

select COUNT(*) from video v where v.id not in
(select v.id from Tags t RIGHT join video v on t.video_id=v.id where t.tag=#{tagsId} GROUP BY v.id )
select COUNT(*) from video v where v.id in (select v.id from Tags t RIGHT join video v on t.video_id=v.id where t.tag=#{tagsId} GROUP BY v.id )
